comment: Leather and candy apple on the nose. Nice smooth dark candy and leather taste. Got some great fruity, walnut finish at the end.
Little bite very smooth warm finish
Not feeling it!  Odd wood taste, not barrel but more like saw dust.  Don't need to buy again.
Love this one. Smooth mouthfeel. Spice and vanilla up front. Leather nose. Spice and oak carries through. Touch of salt on finish. Light feel but strong taste throughout. Just damn good.

5/13/18 R
Had quite a bit of this the second night at Steve’s. Delicious!
Best tasting bourbon to date. So smooth, sweet, vanilla, warm start to finish. Velvet gold.
Very tasty. Sweet and smooth. Paired well with candied bacon
One of firsts when I started expanding my whiskey taste.  Tasting a little cherry sweetness that I didn’t remember. That slight salty finish is pairing quite nicely with my cigar tonight.
